name: BRS – Booking & Reservation System (WooCommerce)
author: UOUAPPS

sections.description:
BRS is a user-friendly booking plugin built with woocommerce, that allows you to integrate a booking / reservation system into your WordPress website.

Whether you’re running a real estate agency, car rental, hotel… BRS plugin is the ideal solution for your business.

Some premium themes are made by this plugin.

Concierge – Luxury Lifestyle Services &
Casa – Book, Rent or Buy Property

The features are offered by BRS:

  • Manage Booking Cost Easily
  • Individual Booking Cost per Resource & Person
  • Booking Availability from Backend
  • Booking availability shows in front-end
  • Define Resource Cost
  • Drag & Drop Functionality for person & resource
  • Custom Order Message via E-mail
  • Select & Choose Multiple Resources ( For Example : Air-conditioning, Garden, Sea view etc. )
  • Apply Coupon code/ Discount Code of Woocommerce

Demo Link : Click Here For Demo

Documentation Link : https://uouapps.com/documentation/brs/
sections.installation:
1. To install the plugin go to the wordpress codex: https://codex.wordpress.org/Managing_Plugins or you can install manually https://codex.wordpress.org/Managing_Plugins#Manual_Plugin_Installation

For details please goto: https://uouapps.com/documentation/brs/
